glsa.title: Icecast: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A bug in the Icecast code handling source client URL authentication causes a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Icecast is an open source alternative to shoutcast that supports mp3, ogg (vorbis/theora) and aac streaming.

description.p: When stream_auth handler is defined for URL authentication and a request is sent without login credentials, a Denial of Service condition can occur.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: Users of affected versions can change stream_auth mountpoints to use password authentication instead.
